Sources

CAISAR is a libre software under the LGPLV2 license. Code is available on our public repository: https://git.frama-c.com/pub/caisar

Releases

Install from the OCaml Package Manager (OPAM)

CAISAR is available either as an opam package, typically available under most mainline Linux distributions.

Install through Docker

A docker image is available for CAISAR on Docker Hub. To download it, docker pull laiser/caisar:pub. Then, to run CAISAR in a shell: $ docker run -it laiser/caisar:pub sh
